name: process_constructions_exterior_uninsulated_walls

arguments.name: selectedattic
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the attic

arguments.name: selectedgarage
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the garage

modeler_description: Calculates material layer properties of uninsulated, unfinished, stud and air constructions for the exterior walls of the attic and garage. Finds surfaces adjacent to the attic and garage and sets applicable constructions.
description: This measure creates uninsulated, unfinished, stud and air constructions for the exterior walls of the attic and garage.
